title: Ring

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a ring, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a top plan view of the ring of the invention showing a plurality of mounted gemstones;
FIG. 2 is a front view of the invention, which is identical to the back view and the layer of a plurality of the gemstones is identical on all sides; and,
FIG. 3 is a perspective view of the invention which shows the right side which is identical to the left side.
